additionalProperty.name: Ingredients
additionalProperty.value: INGREDIENTS: Thickened Cream [Cream (Milk), Mineral Salt (450, Sodium Carbonates), Thickener (400)], Water, Sugar, Dark Chocolate Compound (10%) [Sugar, Palm Kernel Oil, Cocoa Powder, Emulsifiers (Soy Lecithin, 476), Stabiliser (436), Natural Vanilla Flavouring], Whipping Agent [Glucose Syrup, Palm Kernel Oil, Emulsifiers (471, 472a), Sodium Caseinate (Milk), Stabiliser (340), Anticaking Agent (341)], Milk Powder, White Compound Chocolate (2.5%) [Sugar, Palm Fat, Whey (Milk), Skimmed Milk Powder, Stabiliser (492), Emulsifier (Soy Lecithin), Natural Vanilla Flavouring], Egg, Cocoa Powder, Belgian Dark Chocolate (2.0%) [Cocoa Mass, Sugar, Cocoa Butter, Emulsifier (Soy Lecithin), Natural Vanilla Flavouring], Butter [Cream (Milk)], Wheat Flour, Belgian Dark Chocolate Flakes (2.0%) [Sugar, Cocoa Mass, Cocoa Butter, Emulsifier (Soy Lecithin), Natural Vanilla Flavouring], Belgian White Chocolate Flakes (2.0%) [Sugar, Milk Powder, Cocoa Butter, Emulsifier (Soy Lecithin), Natural Vanilla Flavouring], Modified Starch (1422, 1442), Acidity Regulators (339, 270), Natural Vanilla Flavouring, Stabilisers (516, 327), Mineral Salt (450), Emulsifier (401), Thickeners (407, 412, 415), Preservative (Potassium Sorbate), Baking Powder [Raising Agent (450, Sodium Carbonates), Wheat Flour], Vanilla Bean Paste.

additionalProperty.name: Allergen
additionalProperty.value: May Be Present Walnut, Contains SOY, Contains MILK, Contains EGG, Contains Gluten, May Be Present SESAME, Contains Wheat

description: Light vanilla bean and chocolate mousse, layered with indulgent chocolate brownies and rich chocolate ganache, hand finished with Belgian chocolate flakes
name: Indulgent Triple Chocolate Trifle
